marklogic.body: I was teaching an ACT science review to a couple of the kids I tutor. One of the questions showed a 500m core sample from an arctic glacier. Amazingly enough, there were TWO distinct warm/Cold cycles long before bad old man showed up, and the trend was into a current cycle that will swing, just as the others. Someone surely made a mistake showing real science. I did point this out andd asked the kids to relate it to present theory. They noticed.
